title: Hentai Yoku Dekimashita
alternative_title: Well Done(,) Pervert ; へんたいよくできました ; 好一个变态
status: Well Done(,) Pervert ; へんたいよくできました ; 好一个变态
description:
Description :
        Writing lewd thoughts about the adored student council president into a notebook is student council secretary - Kumozawa Koiko. These thoughts were supposed to be a secret, but... StuCo president's younger sister, Nika, stumbles upon the notebook one day?!
It's a start of a comedy where MC becomes a toy for her loved one's younger sister.
(Note: translated from official description)
